pages.title: Spawner
pages.text: Spawners spawn monsters. They can be picked up with a moving wand or a sack of holding. Spawners can also be broken for crafting ingredients. A spawner can be changed by using a spawner changer on it. Spawners will follow normal mob spawn rules.

pages.title: Spawner Changer
pages.text: A spawner changer is used to change the mob inside a vanilla spawner. Right click a mob to capture it, then right click a spawner to use it.

pages.title: Cursed Earth
pages.text: Using a drop of evil on dirt will create cursed earth. It will spread for a large distance and cause stronger and faster mobs to spawn. Good for forcing rare mobs to spawn.

pages.title: Nocturnal Powder
pages.text: Spawns biome specific mobs. Will continue producing mobs until it dissipates.

pages.title: Resturbed Spawner
pages.text: This spawner is made when using a drop of evil on a normal spawner. The spawner will become placable and upgradable, but the mobs spawned will eventually despawn if not killed after a short amount of time.

pages.title: Soul Bead
pages.text: Soul beads are obtained by wraiths in the nether. Using a soul bead will give a 20 minute curse which will cause mobs to spawn without restriction.

pages.title: Woot
pages.text: Woot is a multiblock structure and is configured to be the preferred  mob farm. To capture a mob, use an ender shard on a mob, and then kill 4 of that mob to program it. Then craft the shard into a factory heart and place it on the multiblock. Factory hearts are interchangeable. $(br)Can be used for Ender Dragon and Chaos Guardian.

pages.title: Mob Duplicator
pages.text: Insert a mob imprisonment tool containing the mob to spawn. Can be upgraded.

pages.title: Eio Powered Spawner
pages.text: Crafted from a broken spawner. Mob type can be changed by combining with a soul vial. Can be upgraded with capacitors.

pages.title: Stabilized Spawner
pages.text: This is made by crafting a broken spawner with a core. The type of core used will determine the number of spawned mobs as well as what spawning rules are in place.

pages.title: Soul Shards
pages.text: Using a Vile Sword or and weapon enchanted with Soul Stealer an Unbound Soul Shard can be programmed by killing a mob. Leveling the shards with more kills allows for increased spawn rate and ignoring mob spawning rules.

pages.title: Monolith of Spawning
pages.text: Increases spawn rate within the chunk. Mobs will have extra health and damage.
